item.description:
Columbus day weekend is peak foliage season. We do plan to have a long weekend of hikes, bike rides,  BBQ and bonfires! Saturday we'll have an easy hike and then head over to a nearby social event.  Sunday will be open to a moderate hike or a bike ride or the wonderful Fryeburg Fair is on the other side of Hurricane Mountain Road.   

If you have never been to our house then this is an ideal weekend to make your first visit. The Wedeln Ski House is located on the Bartlet / N. Conway NH townline, close to the Cranmore Ski Area.  The house has hiking and biking trails right out the back side of the house. Accomodations are only $20 per night, bring your own bedding and toiletries. 

Details on food and beverages to be sent out to "YES" RSVPS. There are also many great restaurants in nearby North Conway as well as plenty of tax free outlet shopping. 

Mountain bike update:

MB tour will be 2-4 hrs, and trail will be decided by trip leader Rick P. depending on group. Trail choices include intermediate trails in Bartlett, or Red Tail trail (intermediate to advanced) off Hurricane Mtn Rd. Please leave a comment below if you wish to do the MB Tour. 

 

Hiking update

On Sat 10/8

- A hike to the Bald Faces - Can take up to 6 - moderate led by David

- An easier hike option will be available. 

On Sunday 10/9  

- A hike to the Castles (Advanced) and to Mt. Jefferson (more Advanced) Can maybe take 6.

- An easier hike option will be available. 

Please indicate below in the comments if you are interested in hiking and on which hike

 

More Options! 

If you're looking for something to do this weekend, Attitash is having an Oktoberfest with local beers (Tucks, Moat, etc), Bavarian music, German food, keg toss, stein-holding competition, mechanical bull-riding (not sure what that has to do with Oktoberfest but always fun to watch...) It's being held on Saturday and Sunday starting at Noon. Admission is $10. http://attitash.com/events.html   Attitash - Hills & Hops 5K trail race at 9:15 A on Saturday. Registered online for $20, but you can always sign up at Attitash that morning for $25. The race takes place on the mountain, and according to the description, you run up, down, and across ski trails, so come prepared with proper footwear and clothing. That said, it's supposed to be 71 degrees in North Conway on Saturday, so it'll be a warm one.

 

To RSVP -  a $20 non refundable down payment for this weekend will be required for guests by Thursday September 29th. . This is only open to 21+. Please do not use GPS to find house, you will get lost.  Directions will be sent to all attendees.
item.how_to_find_us: Directions sent to those who RSVP "Yes"
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend @ Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
